Chinese: 大概是甜的……不对，怎么是他妈的辣椒酱
English: It’s supposed to be sweet… but damn, it’s chili sauce!
“God bless it — hope it’s good for something.”
Someone go throw it into the lake and see what happens.

Chinese: 从外形和质感上看，只是一个手提箱罢了
English: Judging by its appearance and texture, it’s just a suitcase.

Chinese: 这个工具箱看起来新的仿佛刚从沃尔玛超市货架上取下来
English: This toolbox looks so new, as if it were just taken off the shelves at a Walmart store.
